subject: Re: [sugar] PLEASE test Build 368 and Q2B84 firmware ASAP.
body:
On 4/7/07, Richard A. Smith  wrote:
> I suspect that your xorg.conf file is just incorrect.  Monitor vs Laptop
> LCD is detected _once_ when you first boot a new image.  So if you
> booted that on a XO first and then tried it in your ATest you will be
> using the wrong xorg.conf.  Try booting a fresh image on the ATest.

Good point. Re-tested to make sure I'm using a virgin image, just dd'd
onto the flash drive. No changes - same behaviour, same log.

Updated the trac ticket also with edid info from the monitors in case
it matters: http://dev.laptop.org/ticket/1274
